title: WTTF or buy Griffith Hindu portrait
author: jggames

posts.post_title: WTTF or buy Griffith Hindu portrait
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I’d like to trade+cash my EPDG Griffith for his Hindu portrait (or purchase) in any condition raw or graded. Roached is fine! I know it’s slim pick’ns for Hindus, but thought I’d give it a shot.

Thank you!
Jason
Bump! Would love to find a beater, as I just saw a higher graded one on eBay. Thanks!
